name: Retro Skate
blurb: What do you get when you mix Double Dragon, Extreme Skateboarding, and 8-Bit graphics? RETRO SKATE!!!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Get the full length Retro Skate theme song for you to listen to on your favorite music player!
Digital download of game soundtrack. This soundtrack includes all music used in Retro Skate as well as some cool SFX (Note: All reward tiers after this include a free copy of the digital soundtrack)
